summary: A cult film is a movie with a small but very passionate fan base. These fans love the movie so much that they quote lines, attend special screenings, and even dress up like characters. Cult films are often weird or controversial, and they might not be popular with everyone. Some famous cult films include "The Rocky Horror Picture Show" and "Plan 9 from Outer Space." Over time, cult films have become more popular, and some have even gained mainstream success.
title: Cult film
